system.availability:
Lasts 2d5 Rounds, count as rolling 10 on all Initiative Rolls, increase Unnatural Agility by +1d5.
If under affects of another Eldar Drug, must make -20 Toughness Test. If failed drug has no effect and suffer 1d10 Energy Damage ignoring armour and Toughness, and gain 1d5 Corruption.
